name: Timepuzzle
overview: Timepuzzle is a Puzzle game, created by Ralf Kober and published by CP Verlag, which was released in Game On 1992/07. This is more than just a normal puzzle. You have to look out for bombs, watch the time and be aware of what needs to happen next. Every time you see an add for a special, you've to decide in short if it is positive or negative for you.
